Uses of Interface
org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq.FastqWriter

  • Packages that use FastqWriter 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.maq.bfq
    This package supports reading and writing Maq's Binary Fastq File format .bfq.
    org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq
    This package contains classes for dealing with fastq data.

    • Uses of FastqWriter in org.jcvi.jillion.maq.bfq

      Methods in org.jcvi.jillion.maq.bfq that return FastqWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FastqWriter BfqFileWriterBuilder.build()
      Create a new FastqWriter instance that will write Binary Fastq encoded data to the given output file.

    • Uses of FastqWriter in org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq

      Methods in org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq that return FastqWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FastqWriter FastqWriter.adapt(FastqWriter delegate, Function<FastqRecord,FastqRecord> adapter)
      Create a new FastqWriter that will wrap the given fastqWriter and intercept any calls to write() to allow the record to be transformed in some way.
      FastqWriter FastqWriterBuilder.build() 
      FastqWriter SplitFastqWriter.FastqWriterFactory.create(int i)
      Create a new FastqWriter for the ith fastq file.
      FastqWriter SplitFastqWriter.DeconvolveFastqRecordWriterFactory.create(K key)
      Create a new FastqWriter for the fastq file for the given deconvolution key.
      static <K> FastqWriter SplitFastqWriter.deconvolve(Function<FastqRecord,K> deconvolutionFunction, SplitFastqWriter.DeconvolveFastqRecordWriterFactory<K> supplier)
      Write out many fastq files where a "deconvolution" function determines which file each record is written to based on the contents of that record.
      static FastqWriter SplitFastqWriter.rollover(int maxRecordsPerFile, SplitFastqWriter.FastqWriterFactory supplier)
      Creates a new FastqWriter instance that will internally create several fastq files that will each contain only the given number of records.
      static FastqWriter SplitFastqWriter.roundRobin(int numberOfFiles, SplitFastqWriter.FastqWriterFactory supplier)
      Creates a new FastqWriter instance that will spread out the FastqRecords to be written to create several fastq files.
      Methods in org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq with parameters of type FastqWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FastqWriter FastqWriter.adapt(FastqWriter delegate, Function<FastqRecord,FastqRecord> adapter)
      Create a new FastqWriter that will wrap the given fastqWriter and intercept any calls to write() to allow the record to be transformed in some way.
